item.title: GPT and MBR: Moving from MBR to GPT
item.description: Intro Link to heading About a year ago I bought a used hard drive from a colleague of mine. This HDD has a size of 3 TiB and is supposed to hold big files like videos, images and some games that are neigher read nor write intensive. Unfortunately I moved from my previous HDD with a Master Boot Record (MBR) and kept using the MBR. This turned out to be a problem since MBR doesn’t support partitions larger than 2 TiB so I could not use all of my 3 TiB drive.
